statement.p: Explain why the vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} -5 \\ 4 \\ -6 \\ 0 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 4 \\ 5 \\ 4 \\ 3 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -6 \\ 13 \\ -8 \\ 3 \\ -5 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -17 \\ 5 \\ -14 \\ 4 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent or linearly independent.

answer.p: The vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} -5 \\ 4 \\ -6 \\ 0 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 4 \\ 5 \\ 4 \\ 3 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -6 \\ 13 \\ -8 \\ 3 \\ -5 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -17 \\ 5 \\ -14 \\ 4 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent .
